start.speaker: Noma
start.text:
Give me one rule.

When you hold a dangerous secret, what do you do first? Not ideally. Always.

choices.text: I warn the people it can harm.
I contain it first. Then decide who can bear it.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text: Noma nods once. The Hollow City doesn’t soften, but it does stop tightening—for now.
